question: HELP ME!! ASAP!! I Just knocked out my front tooth and chipped the tooth to the left of it ! What do I do ?
question_content:
I am SOO scared !

I'm Home Alone !

What do I do ?

Can they fix my teeth ?

Will I need to get dentures?

HELP ME PLEASE !!!!!!

answers.answer_content: Go to the dentist ASAP. If you can't put your tooth back in you can get an implant which is pretty expensive but just like a real tooth, don't worry, it could always be worse. There are many other options aswell .. eg. crowns

Location doesn't matter.  all you can do is pick up your fallen-out tooth and put it in moist papertowels in a plastic bag.  Teeth knocked out can be re-implanted if you get to the dentist's within an hour or two.  Call your mom, older sister, annoying uncle or friendly neighbor--anyone who can get you to a dentist's fast. If not, recovering will take a lot longer due to having to have fake teeth made and implated...  My gosh, it must hurt, and I'm guessing that you're also bleeding profusely...?  Get to the dentist's before time runs out and you'll be OK.

Get to the dentist as soon as you can!!

And take the tooth with you - they MAY be able to save it. If not, you won't need dentures...you'll just get a crown or cap or something of the sort.

Heya,

Keep the tooth for sure and call your dentist for an appointment ASAP.
On most of the cases he/she can help you out and fix it but seriously you must hurry :/

At least call her/him.

Good luck!

well, you had time to go on here!


call the dentist before you go though...
